content: learn how to crochet a beautiful rose following my step by step pattern there is also a video tutorial that can also be found at the base of the blog post this lovely crochet motif can be used to embellish your projects such as hats scarves gloves or you can turn them into a beautiful bunch of keepsake flowers flower crowns or floral wreath this quick and easy crochet motif has so much potential full free pattern and video tutorial can be found at https //blog bellacococrochet com/crochet-rose/ pattern written in uk terms crochet skills needed chain space chain-space slip_stitch slip_stitch insert hook into space yarn over and pull through stitch and loop on hook chain chain yarn over pull through one loop on hook treble_crochet treble_crochet yarn over insert hook into stitch yarn over pull up a loop you will have three loops on the hook yarn over pull through two loops yarn over pull through remaining two loops
